channel.title: Commands help!
channel.description:
hi i need these commands for pwnscape 377
::demote ::resetspec (reset my spec) ::unlimited (unlimited spec and hp)
thanks alot!!
and i edit drops for spirit beast is rare 1 or is rare 3 in npcdrops.cfg also how do i make it so spirit beast does auto att so someone doesnt have to att him for him to att? also how do i make a area multi?

item.title: Commands help!
item.dc:creator: @humza-ali humza-ali
item.description:
@humza-ali wrote:

thanks alot guys!!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 22, 2009, 10:01:28 am[/size][hr]sorry to say but i keep trying to make the area multi but it wont work

the first cord x is for left secound x is for right and the first y is for top and the 2nd y is for bottom. is that right?

Read full topic

item.title: Commands help!
item.dc:creator: @Fight247 Fight247
item.description:
@Fight247 wrote:

[quote=“I D D S I, post:5, topic:279745”]Here you go with your ::demote

[code] } else if (command.startsWith(“demote”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Your Name”)) {
String name = command.substring(7);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 0;
            c.disconnected = true;
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sM(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }
    } [/code]

Replace Your Name with your ingame name.
This means only you can use it.[/quote]

Thanks, I D D S I now he is finished,
And you helped me was searching for this too.

Nice and working,

Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Commands help!
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

Here you go with your ::demote

[code] } else if (command.startsWith(“demote”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Your Name”)) {
String name = command.substring(7);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 0;
            c.disconnected = true;
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sM(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }
    } [/code]

Replace Your Name with your ingame name.
This means only you can use it.

Read full topic

item.title: Commands help!
item.dc:creator: @Fight247 Fight247
item.description:
@Fight247 wrote:

Here you go.

When you open NPCDROPS.cfg you see like this://abbysal npcdrop = 2263 5509 1 10

Okay.

//abbysal change it to the npc name, so you can keep looking, if you want to change/add more drops

npcdrop = 2263

2263 means your npc id.
Change it to yours.

5509 means the item id, change it to the item you want.

1 this means the ammount of the item that you want to get as drop.

10 this means the droprate is 10&

No problem;)

Read full topic

item.title: Commands help!
item.dc:creator: @Fight247 Fight247
item.description:
@Fight247 wrote:

::resetspec

if(command.startsWith("resetspec") && playerRights > 2){ specialAmount += 100; specAttack(); }

this just add your spec +100 if you do it like 10 times u got 1000 spec.

::unlimited if(command.startsWith("unlimited") && playerRights > 2){ specialAmount += 999999999; specAttack(); }

it only doesnt have unlimited spec.

Multi;
search in your client.java public boolean multiCombat() {
U shud see something like this : public boolean multiCombat() { if((absX >= 3144 && absX <= 3184 && absY >= 3519 && absY <=3656) || (absX >= 3185 && absX <= 3350 && absY >= 3502 && absY <=3900) || (absX >= 2983 && absX <= 3007 && absY >= 3905 && absY <=3917) || (absX >= 3007 && absX <= 3075 && absY >= 3608 && absY <=3713) || (absX >= 2944 && absX <= 2963 && absY >= 3812 && absY <=3827) || (absX >= 3041 && absX <= 3057 && absY >= 3869 && absY <=3883) || (absX >= 3157 && absX <= 3181 && absY >= 3874 && absY <=3895) || (absX >= 2720 && absX <= 2760 && absY >= 5073 && absY <=5114) || (absX >= 2256 && absX <= 2287 && absY >= 4680 && absY <=4711) || (absX >= 2360 && absX <= 2445 && absY >= 5045 && absY <= 5125) || (absX >= 2760 && absX <= 2780 && absY >= 2790 && absY <=2810) || (absX >= 2624 && absX <= 2690 && absY >= 2550 && absY <=2619) || (absX >= 3460 && absX <= 3520 && absY >= 9470 && absY <=9530) || (absX >= 2371 && absX <= 2424 && absY >= 5125 && absY <=5167) || (absX >= 2627 && absX <= 2677 && absY >= 4550 && absY <=4602) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3307 && absY >= 3904 && absY <=3952) || (absX >= 2420 && absX <= 2520 && absY >= 10100 && absY <=10200) || (absX >= 2992 && absX <= 3090 && absY >= 4804 && absY <=4872) || (absX >= 3004 && absX <= 2967 && absY >= 3909 && absY <=3914) || (absX >= 3097 && absX <= 3148 && absY >= 3957 && absY <=3943)) return true; else return false; }

add 1 more of it with your coords.
And it is multi
